# Iron-Point Marketing Website

This is the main repo for the Iron-Point Jekyll website.

## Requirements

You'll need to have the following items installed before continuing.

  * [Ruby](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/installation/)
  * [Ruby on Rails](http://rubyonrails.org/download/)
  * [Node.js](http://nodejs.org): Use the installer provided on the NodeJS website.
  * [Grunt](http://gruntjs.com/): Run `[sudo] npm install -g grunt-cli`
  * [Bower](http://bower.io): Run `[sudo] npm install -g bower`
  * [Foundation](http://foundation.zurb.com/): Run `[sudo] gem install foundation`
   * Also `[sudo] gem install ZURB-foundation`
  * [Prose](https://github.com/prose/prose)

## Quickstart

```
git clone https://github.com/IronPoint/IronPoint.github.io.git
npm install && bower install
```

While you're working on your project, run:

`grunt`

And you're set!

 * To use the live reload feature while developing, [install this plugin](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/livereload/jnihajbhpnppcggbcgedagnkighmdlei?hl=en) in Chrome

## Directory Structure

  * `scss/_settings.scss`: Foundation configuration settings go in here
  * `scss/app.scss` AND `scss/custom.scss`: Application styles go here
